title: 关于VV添加按钮问题
author: 和煦樱
txt_content:
为何我使用VexClickableButton可以添加按钮进去而qhgui.addComponent(new VexClickableButton(95050,"a","[local]button1.png","[local]button1_glow.png","[local]button1_glow.png",48,58,60,20,true));复制代码VexButton则不行，求解PLEASE
qhgui.addComponent(new VexButton(95050,"a","[local]button1.png","[local]button1_glow.png",48,58,60,20));复制代码报错:

replies.author: 粘兽
replies.txt_content:
看构造函数

VexClickableButton(int id,java.lang.String name,java.lang.String url,java.lang.String url2,java.lang.String url3,int x,int y,int w,int h,boolean clickable)

VexButton(java.lang.Object id,java.lang.String name,java.lang.String url,java.lang.String url2,int x,int y,int w,int h)复制代码

replies.author: 白羊羊
replies.txt_content: 在最新版本的基础上重新构建一次你的插件就行了，按钮的构造方法稍微有一些变动
